title: Inotrem's phase 2 data spark hope for septic shock treatment
author: Gabrielle Masson
description: Rates of septic shock, a serious complication of sepsis, are on the rise. | Rates of septic shock, a serious complication of sepsis, are on the rise. With only antibiotics and symptomatic treatment available, biotech Inotrem hopes its investigational treatment could be the first mechanism-based therapy to treat the life-threatening condition.
